description: Discord has introduced the DAVE protocol, a custom end-to-end encryption (E2EE) protocol designed to protect audio and video calls on the platform from unauthorized interceptions. [...]
title: Discord rolls out end-to-end encryption for audio, video calls

description: Europol and law enforcement from nine countries successfully dismantled an encrypted communications platform called "Ghost," which was used by organized crime such as drug trafficking and money laundering. [...]
title: Europol takes down "Ghost" encrypted messaging platform used for crime

description: An X account hacking spree has fueled a successful pump-and-dump scheme for the $HACKED Solana token, with people rushing to buy the coin. [...]
title: X hacking spree fuels "$HACKED" crypto token pump-and-dump

description: ​Microsoft says a ransomware affiliate it tracks as Vanilla Tempest now targets U.S. healthcare organizations in INC ransomware attacks. [...]
title: Microsoft: Vanilla Tempest hackers hit healthcare with INC ransomware

description: ​Microsoft says a ransomware affiliate it tracks as Vanilla Tempest now targets U.S. healthcare organizations in INC ransomware attacks. [...]
title: Microsoft: Vanilla Tempest hit healthcare with INC ransomware

description: GitLab has released security updates to address a critical SAML authentication bypass vulnerability impacting self-managed installations of the GitLab Community Edition (CE) and Enterprise Edition (EE). [...]
title: GitLab releases fix for critical SAML authentication bypass flaw

description: Microsoft may have accidentally confirmed that Windows 11 24H2 (Windows 11 2024 Update) is arriving on September 24 as part of the optional preview update, with it rolling out to more people as part of the mandatory October Patch Tuesday updates. [...]
title: Microsoft may have revealed Windows 11 24H2 is coming this month

description: Apple has paused the rollout of iPadOS 18 on iPad Pro tablets with the M4 chip after numerous owners reported the update is "bricking" their devices, with no way to turn them on after performing the update. [...]
title: Apple pulls iPadOS 18 update bricking M4 iPad Pro devices

description: The FBI and cybersecurity researchers have disrupted a massive Chinese botnet called "Raptor Train" that infected over 260,000 networking devices to target critical infrastructure in the US and in other countries. [...]
title: Chinese botnet infects 260,000 SOHO routers, IP cameras with malware

description: On Tuesday, Russian anti-malware company Doctor Web (Dr.Web) disclosed a security breach after its systems were targeted in a cyberattack over the weekend. [...]
title: Russian security firm Dr.Web disconnects all servers after breach

description: Learn about the top 4 security automation use cases that can streamline your cybersecurity efforts. This guide covers reducing enriching indicators of compromise (IoCs), monitoring external attack surface(s), scanning for web application vulnerabilities and monitoring for leaked user credentials - specifically email addresses. title: 4 Top Security Automation Use Cases: A Detailed Guide
